heliolib.utils.add_index_curve_level module

heliolib.utils.add_index_curve_level.add_index_curve_level(df, curve)[source]

Add a new index level to the dataframe converting it into a multi-index dataframe and swap the levels accordingly.

Parameters

dfpd.DataFrame

The DataFrame whose columns need to be adjusted.

curvestr

The name of the level to be used to create the new level.

Returns

pd.DataFrame

DataFrame with adjusted multi-index columns.

get_plants_to_run_at(hour)[source]

Get a list of plant IDs to run at a specified hour.

Parameters

hour (int):

The hour to filter plants for (0 to 23).

Returns

list:

A list of plant IDs that should run at the specified hour.

heliolib.utils.plant_provider.convert_date(current_utc_time, destination_time_zone)[source]

Convert a UTC datetime to a specified timezone.

Parameters

current_utc_time (datetime.datetime):

The UTC datetime to convert.

destination_time_zone (str):

The name of the destination timezone (e.g., ‘America/New_York’).

Returns

datetime.datetime:

The converted datetime in the destination timezone.

heliolib.utils.retry_session module

heliolib.utils.retry_session.retry_api_session(url, retries=3, backoff_factor=3, allowed_request_type=None)[source]

Initializes a requests.Session with retry logic for specific HTTP methods.

Parameters

urlstr

The base URL for the API.

retriesint, optional

The number of times to retry a request, by default 3.

backoff_factorint, optional

A backoff factor to apply between attempts after the second try, by default 3.

allowed_request_typelist of str or None

HTTP methods that should be retried, by default None.

Returns

sessionrequests.Session

A requests.Session object configured with retry logic.

Raises

Exception

If allowed_request_type is None.
